title: Fake News: Joe Biden NOT Appointed As Head Of TSA | Lead Stories
subtitle: Was Joe Biden appointed as the head of the TSA? No, that's not true: the story was made up by...
author: leadstories.com
vclaim:
Was Joe Biden appointed as the head of the TSA? No, that's not true: the story was made up by a satire website mocking Biden's current issues with alleged innapropriate touching during public events. The satirical article went quite viral and was copied by several other sites who failed to mention they took it from a humor website.

The story originated from an article published by The Babylon Bee on April 5, 2019 titled "Joe Biden Appointed As Head Of TSA" (archived here) which opened:

WASHINGTON, D.C.--Amid a flurry of accusations of inappropriate touching and crowding people's personal space leveled at former vice president Joe Biden, President Trump announced Friday that Biden is his appointment to the Transporation Security Administration. Biden will be tasked with showing TSA agents how to violate people's personal space and privacy in their daily groping of American citizens.

Users on social media only saw this title, description and thumbnail:

But "The Babylon Bee" comes with following dislaimer on every page:

At least three websites copied the story from The Babylon Bee without mentioning it was satire:

from The Babylon Bee: WASHINGTON, D.C.-Amid a flurry of accusations of inappropriate touching and crowding people's personal space leveled at former vice president Joe Biden, President Trump announced Friday that Biden is his appointment to the Transporation Security Administration. Biden will be tasked with showing TSA agents how to violate people's personal space and privacy ...

Via Babylon Bee WASHINGTON, D.C.-Amid a flurry of accusations of inappropriate touching and crowding people's personal space leveled at former vice president Joe Biden, President Trump announced Friday that Biden is his appointment to the Transporation Security Administration. Biden will be tasked with showing TSA agents how to violate people's personal space and privacy in...

Joe Biden Appointed As Head Of TSA - The Babylon Bee WASHINGTON, D.C.-Amid a flurry of accusations of inappropriate touching and crowding people's personal space leveled at former vice president Joe Biden, President Trump announced Friday that Biden is his appointment to the Transporation Security Administration. Biden will be tasked with showing TSA agents how to violate people's personal space and privacy in their daily groping...
